content: cc2 held doubled as throughout repeat row 1 and 2 once 2 row worked change to cc1 repeat row 1 and 2 twice 4 row worked change to cc2 repeat row 1 and 2 once 2 row worked change to cc1 repeat row 1 and 2 twice 4 row worked 16 row worked in cc1 and cc2 stripe sequence 77 sts on needle change to mc repeat row 1 and 2 seven times 14 row worked in mc 105 sts on needle change to cc1 repeat row 1 and 2 twice 4 row worked regimental cowl version 1 // ©2024 the lamb & kid // all rights reserved for personal use only no portion of this pattern may be reproduced or distributed in any form or by any means without written permission change to mc repeat rounds 1 and 2 seven times 14 finishing rounds worked in mc 144 sts on needle turn work to ws and bind off on ws using an icelandic bind- off there are several tutorials online for the icelandic bind-off here is one we like https //www knitfreedom com/blog/ change to cc1 repeat rounds 1 and 2 twice 4 rounds icelandic-bobble/ worked change to cc2 repeat rounds 1 and 2 once 2 rounds worked weave in ends on ws change to cc1 repeat rounds 1 and 2 twice 4 rounds wet block and lay flat to dry worked change to cc2 repeat rounds 1 and 2 once 2 rounds worked change to cc1 repeat rounds 1 and 2 twice 4 rounds worked 16 rounds worked in cc1 and cc2 stripe sequence 160 sts on needle change to mc repeat rounds 1 and 2 three times 6 rounds worked 166 sts on needle border work garter stitch border in mc held double you may choose to remove remaining markers on your first border round border round 1 knit around border round 2 purl around repeat border round 1-2 twice repeat border round 1 one more time 7 garter stitch rounds worked visit follow share visit us follow us share with us #thelambandkid 740 winslow way east @thelambandkid and bainbridge island wa the lamb & kid #tlkregimentalcowl www thelambandkid com the lamb & kid
